remarks.format: ## Remarks 该属性会获取和设置 属性的值。The property gets and sets the value of the property. 通道上的活动被定义为接收应用程序或基础结构消息。Activity on a channel is defined as receiving an application or infrastructure message. 非活动超时属性会控制保持非活动会话存在的最长时间。The inactivity timeout property controls the maximum amount of time to keep an inactive session alive. 如果超过 指定的时间间隔后仍没有活动，则基础结构会中止会话，且通道会出错。If more than the specified time interval passes with no activity, the session is aborted by the infrastructure and the channel faults. 可靠会话会遭到单方面撤销。The reliable session is torn down unilaterally. 如果发送应用程序没有要发送的消息，则可靠会话通常不会因处于非活动状态而出错，“保持活动状态”机制会让会话无限期地处于活动状态。If the sending application has no messages to send then the reliable session is normally not faulted because of inactivity; instead a keep-alive mechanism keeps the session active indefinitely. 请注意，如果未发送或接收任何应用程序消息，则调度程序可以单独中止可靠会话。Note that the dispatcher could independently abort the reliable session if no application messages are sent or received. 因此，如果网络状况为未收到任何类型的消息或发送方失败，则非活动超时通常会过期。Thus, the inactivity timeout typically expires if network conditions are such that no messages of any sort are received or if there is a failure on the sender. 设置此超时可防止服务器在客户端关闭安全会话之前一直保持该会话。Setting this timeout prevents the server from holding onto a security session if the client does not close it. 如果安全会话在非活动时间间隔内未收到消息，则服务器会将其关闭。If the security session has not received a message for the inactivity interval of time, it is closed by the server. 这样可降低发生拒绝服务攻击的可能性。This mitigates a potential denial of service attack. 使用可靠会话时，必须同时满足两个不同的非活动计时器，才能使连接处于活动状态。When using a reliable session, there are two different inactivity timers that must be satisfied to keep the connection alive. 如果任一非活动计时器结束计时，则将断开连接。If either of these inactivity timers goes off, then the connection is dropped. - 第一个非活动计时器为可靠会话计时器，称为 。The first inactivity timer is on the reliable session and is called the . 如果在超时期限内没有收到任何应用程序消息或基础结构消息，此非活动计时器将激发。This inactivity timer fires if no messages, either application or infrastructure, are received within the timeout period. 基础结构消息是指为了通道堆栈中的协议之一（例如，保持活动状态或确认，而并非包含应用程序数据）而生成的消息。An infrastructure message is a message that is generated for the purpose of one of the protocols in the channel stack, such as a keep alive or an acknowledgment, rather than containing application data. - 第二个非活动计时器为服务计时器，它使用绑定的 设置。The second inactivity timer is on the service and uses the setting of the binding. 如果在超时期限内没有收到任何应用程序消息，此非活动计时器将激发。This inactivity timer fires if no application messages are received within the timeout period. 由于任一非活动计时器激发都会断开连接，因此单纯增大 （当其大于 时）不起任何作用。Since the connection is dropped if either inactivity timer fires, increasing once it is greater than has no effect. 这两个超时时间的默认值均为 10 分钟，因此在使用可靠会话时，必须同时增大这两个超时时间才会起作用。The default for both of these timeouts is 10 minutes, so you always have to increase both of them to make a difference when using a reliable session. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UEReliableSession#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/uereliablesession/cs/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[UEReliableSession#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/uereliablesession/vb/program.vb#2)]
